item.title: Sowmya add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Sowmya add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Sowmya add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "The trouble with having an open mind, of course, is that people will insist on coming along and trying to put things in it." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Sowmya add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Sowmya add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "Animals are my friends...and I don't eat my friends." -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: Sowmya add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "A lady's imagination is very rapid; it jumps from admiration to love, from love to matrimony in a moment." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Sowmya add a quote by J.M. Barrie
item.description: "To die would be an awfully big adventure." -- J.M. Barrie

item.title: Sowmya add a quote by Daphne Rae
item.description: "I have found the paradox, that if you love until it hurts, there can be no more hurt, only more love." -- Daphne Rae

item.title: Sowmya add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Never tell the truth to people who are not worthy of it." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Sowmya add a quote by Al Gore
item.description: "The planet is in distress and all of the attention is on Paris Hilton." -- Al Gore

item.title: Sowmya add a quote by Barack Obama
item.description: "Yes We Can!" -- Barack Obama

item.title: Sowmya add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "It is hard enough to remember my opinions, without also remembering my reasons for them!" -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Sowmya add a quote by David Letterman
item.description: "Labour day is a great American holiday that people celebrate by going out and buying products made in China" -- David Letterman

item.title: Sowmya add a quote by Anton Chekhov
item.description: "...and with a burning pain in my heart I realized how unnecessary, how petty, and how deceptive all that had hindered us from loving was. I understood that when you love you must either, in your reasonings about that love, start from what is highest, from what is more important than happiness or unhappiness, sin or virtue in their accepted meaning, or you must not reason at all." -- Anton Chekhov

item.title: Sowmya add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "A true Zen saying: "Nothing is what I want." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Sowmya add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "Men learn to love the woman they are attracted to. Women learn to become attracted to the man they fall in love with." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Sowmya add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "If you only read the books that everyone else is reading, you can only think what everyone else is thinking." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Sowmya add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Sowmya add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "I'm not upset that you lied to me, I'm upset that from now on I can't believe you." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Sowmya add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "A bear, however hard he tries, grows tubby without exercise." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Sowmya add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "How come when it’s us, it’s an abortion, and when it’s a chicken, it’s an omelette?" -- George Carlin

item.title: Sowmya add a quote by Margaret Sanger
item.description: "No woman can call herself free who does not control her own body." -- Margaret Sanger

item.title: Sowmya add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "It serves me right for putting all my eggs in one bastard." -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: Sowmya add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Memories warm you up from the inside. But they also tear you apart." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Sowmya add a quote by Vikram Seth
item.description: "God save us from people who mean well." -- Vikram Seth
